duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage client relations, facilities, and the front desk staff team, including front desk scheduling.
Recruit and hire client service associates and manage front desk staff scheduling.
Oversee the day-to-day functions of the studio and maintain facilities up to standards.
Coordinate and manage studio maintenance from 3rd party vendors and responsible for inventory control and month-end reconciliation.
Develop and maintain meaningful connections with clients and resolve all client booking requests and issues.
Build and manage a positive, productive, and supportive team, and perform training and development for front desk staff.

education_certification.credential: 2-year management and supervisorial experience in the fitness industry
